# NWProtocolFramer.StartResult.willMarkReady

**Case**

The protocol will perform a handshake, preventing the overall connection from becoming ready until [doc://com.apple.network/documentation/Network/NWProtocolFramer/Instance/markReady()] is called.

## Declaration

```swift
case willMarkReady
```

## Related Documentation

- **markReady()**: Indicates to a connection that your protocol’s handshake is complete.

## Start Results

- **NWProtocolFramer.StartResult.ready**: The protocol is immediately ready to send and receive data.
